page.title: 09leisure in BLACKBURN
page.content: BLACKBURN offers a wide range of leisure activities from swimming pools and snooker halls to all weather football pitches and parks such as Queens park, Witton park and Corporation park.There is one main leisure centre in Blackburn that is Shadsworth centre, which has a swimming pool, squash courts, badminton and table tennis facilities. There are two snooker halls both run by the same organisation, Centre cue and Cue two. Also there is a snooker club on Railway Street. There are two indoor swimming pools just outside the town centre. The Government have just given their approval for a new fun pool, this will consist of many activities like a forty foot slide,automatic wave machine and two diving boards.
